matrix.adapterDistribution

Class AsynchronousTaskResultListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • matrix.adapterDistribution.AsynchronousTaskResultListener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsynchronousTaskListenerJPPF

    public class AsynchronousTaskResultListener
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a helper for implementing the asynchronous result matrix reconstruction.
    Author:
    Antonela Tommasel

      • AsynchronousTaskResultListener

        public AsynchronousTaskResultListener(int taskNumber,
                              Matrix res,
                              MatrixReconstructionStrategy matrixReconstructionStrategy)
        Parameters:
        taskNumber - the total number of tasks to be executed
        res - the matrix where to build the result
        matrixReconstructionStrategy - strategy to build the result matrix
